t: Mark Gottlieb Talks Books: Kensington Publishing Editor-In-Chief John Scognamiglio — Literary Agent Mark Gottlieb
s: January 27, 2020 - There are various book publishing imprints at Kensington, such as Lyrical Press, Pinnacle, Citadel, etc. What did you set out to do in creating your eponymous imprint, John Scognamiglio Books? With my imprint, we wanted to shine a spotlight on new authors and new voices.
Nourishing a universal passion for reading by connecting authors and their writing with readers everywhere.
